trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Framework.IEventSource.ErrorRaised"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Fornece dados para o <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Framework.IEventSource.ErrorRaised"> </xref> eventos.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Framework.BuildErrorEventArgs"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Framework.BuildErrorEventArgs"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Framework.BuildErrorEventArgs"></xref> class with the specified <xref:Microsoft.Build.Framework.BuildErrorEventArgs.SubCategory*>, <xref:Microsoft.Build.Framework.BuildErrorEventArgs.Code*>, <xref:Microsoft.Build.Framework.BuildErrorEventArgs.File*>, <xref:Microsoft.Build.Framework.BuildErrorEventArgs.LineNumber*>, <xref:Microsoft.Build.Framework.BuildErrorEventArgs.ColumnNumber*>, <xref:Microsoft.Build.Framework.BuildErrorEventArgs.EndLineNumber*>, <xref:Microsoft.Build.Framework.BuildErrorEventArgs.EndColumnNumber*>, <xref:Microsoft.Build.Framework.BuildEventArgs.Message*>, <xref:Microsoft.Build.Framework.BuildEventArgs.HelpKeyword*>, and <xref:Microsoft.Build.Framework.BuildEventArgs.SenderName*> values.
trans-unit.target: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Framework.BuildErrorEventArgs"></xref> class with the specified <>*>, <>*>, <>*>, <>*>, <>*>, <>*>, <>*>, <>*>, <>*>, and <>*> values.

trans-unit.source: The custom subcategory of the event.
trans-unit.target: A subcategoria personalizada do evento.

trans-unit.target: O código de erro do evento.

trans-unit.target: O nome do arquivo associado ao evento.
